name: StatusOfRecommendations
title: Status of Recommendations
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes that document the status of an intervention recommendation.),(Data Element Scope: Attribute: Status
Datatype: Intervention, Performed

The intent of this data element is to document the status of an intervention recommendation.),(Inclusion Criteria: Any code that documents the status of a intervention recommendation.),(Exclusion Criteria: Any code is not related to the status of an intervention recommendation.)
